description.value:
Activate 1 (manipulate)

With an incredibly deep black hue, sightless tincture is usually @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] in wine, blood pudding, or other darkly colored foods. The oil at first faintly dims its victim's sight, then blacks it out entirely.

Saving Throw @Check[fortitude|dc:28]

Onset 10 minutes

Maximum Duration 14 hours

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] and a –2 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour)

Stage 2 dazzled and a –4 status penalty to visual Perception checks (1 hour)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] (2d6 hours); stage 3 is an incapacitation effect, and if the victim is still blinded from the poison when the poison has run its course, the blindness lasts for an additional 24 hours afterward
